name: Kafka to HelixDb
description: Template to stream data from Kafka and index embeddings into HelixDB using OpenAI.

parameters.name: brokers
parameters.label: Kafka Brokers
parameters.helpText: Comma-separated list of Kafka brokers (e.g., host1:9092,host2:9092)

parameters.name: kafkaUsername
parameters.label: kafka username
parameters.helpText: kafka cluster username/API key for authentication

parameters.name: kafkaSecurityProtocol
parameters.label: kafka security protocol
parameters.helpText: kafka security protocol for authentication. Eg: PLAINTEXT, SSL, SASL_PLAINTEXT, and SASL_SSL

parameters.name: kafkaSaslMechanism
parameters.label: kafka sasl Mechanism
parameters.helpText: kafka sasl Mechanism for authentication. Eg:PLAIN, SCRAM-SHA-256, SCRAM-SHA-512, GSSAPI

parameters.name: embeddingModel
parameters.label: Embedding Model
parameters.helpText: Name of the embedding model to use (e.g., text-embedding-ada-002)
